verbose_text: Several studies have shown increased expression of resistin in abdominal adipose tissue of obese individuals [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR] which correlates with the severity of obesity [XREF_BIBR] and insulin resistance [XREF_BIBR], while others failed to confirm any impact of obesity and insulin resistance on the concentrations of resistin [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
